keyword: how many calories in a krispy kreme
title: How Many Calories in a Krispy Kreme?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut, plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Krispy Kreme?
assumptions: Original Glazed variety, standard size (~52 g), fresh from the store, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, freshness, and customizations; values based on standard Krispy Kreme data. Check official sources or packaging.

quick_answer.text: One Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut contains 190 calories and 2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut?
What are the carbs in a Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 10 g sugars and 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in one Krispy Kreme doughnut?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, with 5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are Krispy Kreme doughnuts high in sodium?
faqs.a: One has around 80 mg sodium, moderate for a treat.

faqs.q: Do different Krispy Kreme flavors have more calories?
faqs.a: Yes, filled or iced varieties can add 20â€“100+ calories; check specifics.
